sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with e kou 鵝口 , goose-mouth. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry lu jiao 鹿角：小兒重 舌，鵝口瘡，炙熨之 , “When children have a heavy tongue with goose-mouth sores , press a heated [deer horn] on it”. E lai 惡癩 , malign repudiation-illness [1]

Pathological Condition identical with lai 癩 , repudiation-illness. Because the appearance and the further course of this disease are very severe, it is also called ‘malign repudiation-illness ’”. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 12: 大風惡癩可二十服 , “For massive wind, (i.e.) malign repudiation-illness , one may ingest twenty”.
